content: crochet pattern byisabel saltzman mesh tote bag materials ● yarn lily sugar n cream worsted weight 4 100% cotton/ 240 yds ● hook us h/8 5 00 mm ● tapestry needle scissors instructions front and back panel make 2 row 1 chain 45 45 row 2 double_crochet in the 3rd chain from the hook double_crochet in each chain across 43 row 3-5 chain 2 turn double_crochet in each stitch across 43 row 6-28 chain 2 turn double_crochet 5 chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet 1 x 17 double_crochet 4 43 reference figure 1 row 29 chain 2 turn double_crochet in each stitch across 43 finish off and weave in ends straps make 2 skill leveleasy row 1 chain 102 102 - should have knowledge of basic row 2 double_crochet in the 3rd chain from the hook double_crochet stitches finishing and joining in each chain across 100 techniques finish off and weave in ends gauge 13 single_crochet and 14 r 4in x 4in assembly notes with a tapestry needle join the panels along - written in us terms 3 edges the last double_crochet row is the top of the - finished size 13in x 15in tote bag - ch2 turning stitch does not count attach straps as shown in the photo as a stitch stitch key - chain chain - double_crochet double_crochet - skip skip reference pictures row 6-28 mesh design figure 1-4 repeat mesh for 17 total times figure 1-1 chain 2 turn double_crochet 5 chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet 1 figure 1-2 chain 1 skip 1 figure 1-5 double_crochet figure 1-3 double_crochet 1
